workflow: Complex E2E Banking Journey: Register, Login, Open Account, Transfer Funds, and Request Loan.

I am on the registration page and need to fill out the registration form. I have already filled some of the fields. Based on the previous steps, I will fill in the rest of the fields on the registration page and then submit the form. The next field to fill is the address.
